TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void StrokeHitEventHandler(object sender, StrokeHitEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed StrokeHitEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeHitEventArgs"> that contains the event data.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit"> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester>.
